name: Tangled Together
description:
Tangled Together

This is an early build of the game Tangled Together which is a 3D physics based co-op game where you and your friend are attached to each other by a rope. You will have to work together with the rope to your advantage. This is still a early build and focuses for this build are the basics player mechanics  such as movement and rope  physics. The goal here is to see if people would be intressted in playing this type of game. Our vision is to add unique fun experiences :)

Controls in Tangled Together:

Tips when playing: Use Anchor to stretch the rope to be able to catapult over larger gaps. You can use anchor while swinging to use it more like a rubber band. One player can reel in rope and the other release rope.

Controller (Xbox/Playstation):

Walking                               : Left stick

Camera                                : Right stick

Jump                                      : A / Cross

Reel in / release rope   :LT,RT / L2,R2

Let go of grab                    : B / Circle

Anchor self                         : X / Square (Hold down)

Keyboard Controls Player 1:

Walking                 : W, A, S, D

Camera                  : Mouse

Jump                       : Space

Release rope      : E

Let go of grab    : G, Space

Anchor self         : R (Hold down)

Keyboard Controls Player 2:

Walking                  : Arrow keys

Camera                   : Mouse

Jump                        : 0 numpad

Reel in rope         : 1 numpad

Let go of grab     : 5 or 0 numpad

Anchor self          : 3 (Hold down)

Cameramovement:

Keyboard: Move mouse to rotate camera

Hand controller:

Left stick

Camera sensitivity: (press Enter to edit)
